pages.text: $(li)Flax can spawn near the water in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l).$(br)$(li)Like other crops, when you harvest the Wild Flax left clicking on it you will receive Flax Seeds and Flax.

$(li)Flax can be used to craft multiple items in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br2)$(l) Flax Recipes$()$(li)$(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/flax_block)Flax Bale$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/rope)Rope$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/sack)Sack$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/supplementaries/doormat)Doormat$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/string)String$(/l)
